Name: Darkvision
MaterialComponents: either a pinch of dried carrot or an agate

Name: Enchance Ability
MaterialComponents: fur or feather from a beast

Name: Flaming Sphere
MaterialComponents: a bit of tallow\44\ a pinch of brimstone\44\ and a dusting of powdered iron

Name: Heat Metal
MaterialComponents: a piece of iron and a flame

Name: Hold Person
MaterialComponents: a small\44\ straight piece of iron

Name: Locate Animals or Plants
MaterialComponents: a bit of fur from bloodhound

Name: Moonbeam
MaterialComponents: several seeds of any moonseed plant and a piece of opalescent feldspar

Name: Pass without Trace
